remarks: Closure of concatenation with a singleton.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)
statement:
cats1cld.1 $e |- T = ( S concat <" X "> ) $.
cats1cld.2 $e |- ( ph -> S e. Word A ) $.
cats1cld.3 $e |- ( ph -> X e. A ) $.
cats1co.4 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
cats1co.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( F o. S ) = U ) $.
cats1co.6 $e |- V = ( U concat <" ( F ` X ) "> ) $.
cats1co $p |- ( ph -> ( F o. T ) = V ) $.
